Articles.Content:
I'm not sure what caused it, but when I tried to enter a command pod (I was spamming the [board] key and the game froze for about 0.3 seconds, that's all I know) I ended up with a kerbonaut inside the pod, and a kerbonaut outside the pod, but there was only one kerbonaut to start with.

![fmnXG8I.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/fmnXG8I.jpg)

I just got the same thing. I don't know what to do about it- surely something's going to go horribly wrong if I have two copies of the same Kerbal wandering around, but by the same token I'm worried something will go horribly wrong if I try to terminate the duplicate.
FWIW I edited the save file to remove the "clone", and that seems to have worked.
Did you have Kerbal Inventory System installed?
I don't remember, sorry. I definitely had KAS, but I may have been using a pre-KIS version; not sure.
